sentences.en: 'I call myself the Samson of the firewood guillotine.
sentences.cn: “ 我把我自己叫作木柴断头台的参孙.

sentences.en: " -- At the last post. How many to the Guillotine today? "
sentences.cn: “ 在刚才那驿站里, 他们说今天有多少人上断头台? ”

sentences.en: Along the Paris streets six tumbrels are carrying the day's wine to La Guillotine.
sentences.cn: 沿着巴黎的街道,六辆押送死囚的囚车装载着当天去祭断头台的祭品.

sentences.en: But I wouldn't want to go to the guillotine.
During the Reign of Terror hundreds were daily dispatched by the guillotine.
sentences.cn: 在大恐怖时期,每天有几百人被送上断头台.

sentences.en: He ends it by pretending to end his life – with a guillotine.
sentences.cn: 他表演的最后一幕是假装在断头台上结束自己的生命。

sentences.en: I call it my Little Guillotine.
sentences.cn: 我把它叫作我的断头台.

sentences.en: I call myself the Samson of the firewood guillotine.
sentences.cn: 我把我自己叫作木柴断头台的参孙.

sentences.en: One after the other Danton, Robespierre and the rest went to the guillotine.
sentences.cn: 丹东、罗伯斯比尔以及其他人被逐一送上了断头台。

sentences.en: Opposition leaders accused the government of introducing a guillotine motion to stifle debate.
sentences.cn: 反对党领袖指责政府推行规定辩论时限的动议来压制辩论。

sentences.en: Sheet Metal , Metalworking Guillotine , Shear, Bend Shear , New , Used, Machinery Sheet Metal.
sentences.cn: 采购产品金属板材, 金属加工(剪切, 弯曲)机械钣金.

sentences.en: Six tumbrils carry the day's wine to La Guillotine.
sentences.cn: 六辆死囚车给断头台小姐送去了那天的美酒.

sentences.en: That particular one thing was invented by a Frenchman and it is called "guillotine.
sentences.cn: 而这件特别的东西是由一个法国人发明的，名叫“断头台”。

sentences.en: The Guillotine goes handsomely. I love it.
sentences.cn: 断头台干得真漂亮, 我真喜欢它.

sentences.en: The invention of the guillotine was opportune to this mood.
sentences.cn: 断头台的发明恰好适合这种气氛.

sentences.en: The ministers of Sainte Guillotine are robed and ready.
sentences.cn: 圣断头台的使者们已经穿好刑袍,做好准备.
把全部贵族都送上断头台!

sentences.en: Within twenty - four hours he died on the guillotine.
sentences.cn: 不出24小时,他就要死在断头台上.

trans.tran_cn: 断头台，（切纸的）铡刀，切纸机，（英国议会中）截止辩论以付表决法
trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment used to cut off the heads of criminals, especially in France in the past

trans.tran_cn: 于断头台斩首；终止辩论将议案付诸表决
trans.tran_en: to cut off someone’s head using a guillotine
